gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Matthew
gospel.text:
[[Mt 23,23]]Jesus said: "Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, you hypocrites. You pay tithes of mint and dill and cummin, and have neglected the weightier things of the law: judgment and mercy and fidelity. (But) these you should have done, without neglecting the others.
[[Mt 23,24]]Blind guides, who strain out the gnat and swallow the camel!
[[Mt 23,25]]Woe to you, scribes and Pharisees, you hypocrites. You cleanse the outside of cup and dish, but inside they are full of plunder and self-indulgence.
[[Mt 23,26]]Blind Pharisee, cleanse first the inside of the cup, so that the outside also may be clean."

first_reading.title: Second Letter to the Thessalonians
first_reading.text:
[[2_Th 2,1]]We ask you, brothers and sisters, with regard to the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ and our assembling with him,
[[2_Th 2,2]]not to be shaken out of your minds suddenly, or to be alarmed either by a "spirit," or by an oral statement, or by a letter allegedly from us to the effect that the day of the Lord is at hand.
[[2_Th 2,3a]]Let no one deceive you in any way.
[[2_Th 2,14]]To this end he has (also) called you through our gospel to possess the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ.
[[2_Th 2,15]]Therefore, brothers, stand firm and hold fast to the traditions that you were taught, either by an oral statement or by a letter of ours.
[[2_Th 2,16]]May our Lord Jesus Christ himself and God our Father, who has loved us and given us everlasting encouragement and good hope through his grace,
[[2_Th 2,17]]encourage your hearts and strengthen them in every good deed and word.

psalm.title: Psalms
psalm.text:
[[Ps 96,10]]Say among the nations: The LORD is king. 
He has made the world firm, not to be moved; 
He governs the peoples with equity.

[[Ps 96,11]]Let the heavens be glad and the earth rejoice; 
let the sea and what fills it resound;
[[Ps 96,12a]]Let the plains be joyful and all that is in them!
[[Ps 96,12b]]Then shall all the trees of the forest exult.

[[Ps 96,13]]The LORD comes, 
he comes to rule the earth. 
He shall rule the world with justice 
and the peoples with his constancy.
